#summary Remove the specified asset from the asset service.
#labels Protocol-Asset

= Request Format =

<pre>
DELETE /assets/9b99f145-37d6-4f7b-b898-13f0035fb437 HTTP/1.1
</pre>

= Response Format =

Asset successfully removed:

<pre>
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Date: Wed, 09 Dec 2009 07:36:06 GMT
Server: Apache/2.2.10 (Linux/SUSE)
X-Powered-By: Simian Asset Server
Content-Length: 0
Content-Type: text/html
</pre>

Asset not found:

<pre>
HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found
Date: Wed, 09 Dec 2009 07:36:06 GMT
Server: Apache/2.2.10 (Linux/SUSE)
X-Powered-By: Simian Asset Server
Content-Length: 0
Content-Type: text/html
</pre>

= Supported Response Codes =

  * 200
    * Asset was removed from the asset service
  * 404
    * Asset was not found
  * 500
    * Internal server error occurred

= Code Examples =

PHP:

{{{
$assetID = '9b99f145-37d6-4f7b-b898-13f0035fb437';
$r = new HttpRequest('http://services.example.com/' . $assetID, HttpRequest::METH_DELETE, array("timeout"=>5, "useragent"=>"Example Services Client"));
$r->send();
// Get raw response Message:
// $r->getRawResponseMessage()
// Get response body only:
// $r->getResponseBody();
// Get http response code:
// $r->getResponseCode();
}}}
